name: Industrial IoT Platform
description: Cloud-based platform for managing and analyzing data from industrial IoT sensors and devices

inputs.projectVision: Scalable IoT platform for industrial manufacturing. Connect 100,000+ sensors and devices, collect real-time data, perform edge processing, provide predictive maintenance analytics, and enable remote device management. Support for multiple protocols (MQTT, CoAP, OPC-UA).

predefinedRisks.description: Real-time edge processing on resource-constrained devices
Industrial customers require on-premise deployment option

keyDeliverables: Business case with market opportunity analysis
Use case model for device management and analytics
Risk assessment for high-volume data ingestion
Time-series database design for sensor data
ML pipeline architecture for predictive maintenance
Prototype validating data ingestion at scale
Iteration 1: Device connectivity and protocol gateways
Iteration 2: Data ingestion pipeline and storage
Iteration 5: Device management and remote configuration
Edge agent software for industrial devices
On-premise deployment option for enterprise customers
Training for industrial engineers and operators

rationale: IoT platforms have complex architecture requirements (cloud + edge, real-time processing, scalability). Three Elaboration iterations validate architecture with prototypes addressing high technical risks. Five Construction iterations deliver device management, data pipeline, analytics, and ML features incrementally. RUP's risk-driven approach ensures scalability is proven early.
